subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1675, how did it go?
description_text:
All went fine. Pedals are working perfectly (and I am using Linux :D).

Thanks

On 6/22/25 13:35, SIMSONN wrote:

> Hello Mathieu, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.
>
> Hello Mathieu,
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Mathieu Ferracin,  As soon as we have the updated tracking number for the reshipment, we will notify you immediately.

Hi Mathieu Ferracin,  I noticed that your order includes the PlusX controller and the VAM Pro motor. I will check with our operations team today— the PlusX has already been shipped, while the VAM Pro motor will be shipped separately due to a delay. Please see the details below:      Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the first batch of orders is expected to begin shipping between June 16th and 18th. International express shipping will be used, ensuring fast delivery.

Hi,

Would you kindly share any update on the pedals Shipment ? It is still the same tracking number reported, and still not found on the tracking site.
Appreciate your support

Regards.

Envoyé depuis Proton Mail pour Android

-------- Message d'origine --------
Le 14/06/2025 04:11, service@simsonn.com  a écrit :

> Hi Mathieu Ferracin,
>
> I noticed that your order includes the PlusX controller and the VAM Pro motor.
> I will check with our operations team today—
> the PlusX has already been shipped,
> while the VAM Pro motor will be shipped separately due to a delay. Please see the details below:
>
> Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the first batch of orders is expected to begin shipping between June 16th and 18th. International express shipping will be used, ensuring fast delivery.
>
>>
Hi Mathieu Ferracin,  Here is the latest tracking information. Please have a look.
ID 号为 411 和 413 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单411  
      主题: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1675 is on the way  
      描述:  Hi,  
 Is it normal that ordre tracking site does bot recognize the tracking number ? 
 Thanks for your update. 
 Envoyé depuis Proton Mail pour Android

合并来自工单413  
      主题: Re: 回复：Re: A shipment from order #SSN1675 is on the way  
      描述:  Thanks a lot for the very quick follow-up!! I"ll let you know if there is any update on my side. 
 Good day 
 Mathieu. 
 
  -------- Message d'origine -------- Le 13/06/2025 11:19, General and sales enquiries  a écrit :  

 
  It is true that there is no tracking information for your parcel, I have confirmed with the warehouse that it has indeed been dispatched, it is possible that the logistics provider has lost the goods and we are investigating. If there is no result we will use UPS Express to ship your parcel and it is expected to be delivered for you on the 16th. We are sorry for the trouble we have caused you!  
 
 
   
   
   
 

       
Mathieu Ferracin<mferracin@proton.me> 在 2025年6月13日 周五 17:02 写道： 
 
 
 
 Hi,  
 Is it normal that ordre tracking site does bot recognize the tracking number ? 
 Thanks for your update.
